polgahawela pradeshiya lekam kottasaye apanayana boga wagawa wyaptha kirime wadasatahanak kriyathmaka kota atha.apanayana krushikarma departhamenthuwa magin kriyathmaka me wadasatahanin danata pradeshaye gowin sandaha kopi, gammiris, kurundu ha puwak pala wishala thogayak beda di thibe.me sandaha sahanadhara wadapiliwelakda kriyathmaka wana athara akkara bagayata wada wadi idam sandaha eya adala we.polgahawela pradeshiya lekam kottasayata ayath polgahawela ha pothuhara gowijanasewa kottasawala danata wadasatahana kriyathmakaya.memagin danata pradeshaye gowin sandaha kurundu pala 2601k gammiris pala 6930k, kopipala 2400k ha puwak pala 400kda labadi atha.pasugiya wasarawalata sapekshawa me wasare apanayana boga wagawa pilibanda pradesha wasinge unanduwa wadiwemin pawathina bawa penwadena polgahawela apanayana krushikarma wyaptha niladhari, ech.em.bi. herath mahatha apanayana bogawagawalin honda aadayamak laba ganimata hakiwimath wana sathungen siduwana haniya awama wimath meyata behewin hethuwi athi bawada hethema penwa deyi..

dhamsak nam “dukkhan parinyenyayyanා parinyanyathan, samudayo paha thabebapahiෙna, nirodho sachchikathabeba sachchikatho, magegaා bhawe thabeba bhawitho” yi kiyanalada ekehi sashi thun thun aaren pawathi desun nyana” anupubebana baranasitho kapapasika wana sanngan, thatho uruwelan, thatho rajahan thathi kapilapuran, thatho sithawananathi imina anukkamena aaga nanatha anupubebana aaganatha’ yi yuhu.
